gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 125, Cavaliers 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Cavaliers, 125-113. Aaron Nesmith recorded a career-high 26 points (10-16 FG, 5-9 3PM), along with nine rebounds for the Pacers, while Tyrese Haliburton added 21 points, eight rebounds and 13 assists in the victory. Evan Mobley led all scorers with 33 points (12-22 FG), along with 14 rebounds for the Cavaliers in the losing effort. The Pacers improve to 2-0 on the season, while the Cavaliers fall to 1-2.
